Description: Ostracon, fragment of the upper-body of a red-brown pottery ribbed vessel, the interior is covered with a dark-brown resinous deposit, the exterior is covered with a self-slip, remains of one line of incised text (?) and one incised plant motif.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394340) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394340)
